elements.name: User should able to arrange products in "Name: Z to A" alphabetical order

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover on computer top tab
I mouse hover and click on "Desktops"
I select sort by position "Name: Z to A"
I should be able to verify the product arranged in descending order

name: Computer Test
description: As a user I want to navigate to computer page and its all related products page on nopcommerce website

elements.name: User should navigate to register page successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I click on register link
I should be able to navigate to the registration page
I should be able to see "Register" page title

elements.name: User should able to register with valid inputs to all mandatory field

steps.name: I am on homepage
I click on register link
I enter first name "Hemal"
I enter last name "Purohit"
I enter email "xyz@gmail.com"
I enter password "abc1234"
I enter confirm password "abc1234"
I click on register button
I should be able to register
